segments.text: Oh my goodness, look at that little boy trying to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's standing on that stool, and it looks like it's about to tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm so scared he's going to fall and hurt himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is just standing there, waiting for him to hand her a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn't seem to care that he's in danger, she just wants her treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish their mother would turn around and see what's happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But she's too busy with her dishes, completely unaware of the chaos behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is overflowing, and the floor is getting slippery, adding to the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't watch, I'm so scared something bad is going to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I really hope they all stay safe and sound.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is just too much excitement for me to handle.
segments.speaker: PAR
